mapper.select: select a.articleId, a.title, a.content, a.regdate, a.updateDate, a.views, a.is_notice, nvl(f.URL, 'file null') as fileUrl, nvl(u.NICKNAME, 'nickname null') as writerNickname, nvl(l.TITLE, 'lecture title null') as lectureTitle from article a left outer join FILE_INFO f on a.FILEID = f.FILEID left outer join USER_INFO u on a.WRITERID = u.id left outer join LECTURE l on a.lectureid = l.LECTUREID order by ARTICLEID desc

SELECT a.articleId, a.title, a.content, a.regdate, a.updateDate, a.views, a.is_notice, NVL(f.URL, 'file null') AS fileUrl, NVL(u.NICKNAME, 'nickname null') AS writerNickname, NVL(l.TITLE, 'lecture title null') AS lectureTitle FROM ( SELECT articleId, title, content, regdate, updateDate, views, is_notice, FILEID, WRITERID, LECTUREID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ARTICLEID DESC) AS rnum FROM ARTICLE WHERE LECTUREID = #{lectureId} ) a LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_INFO f ON a.FILEID = f.FILEID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_INFO u ON a.WRITERID = u.id LEFT OUTER JOIN LECTURE l ON a.LECTUREID = l.LECTUREID WHERE a.rnum BETWEEN #{offset} AND (#{offset} + #{limit} - 1) ORDER BY a.rnum

select a.articleId, a.title, a.content, a.regdate, a.updateDate, a.views, a.is_notice, nvl(f.URL, 'file null') as fileUrl, nvl(u.NICKNAME, 'nickname null') as writerNickname, nvl(l.TITLE, 'lecture title null') as lectureTitle from article a left outer join FILE_INFO f on a.FILEID = f.FILEID left outer join USER_INFO u on a.WRITERID = u.id left outer join LECTURE l on a.lectureid = l.LECTUREID where a.articleId = #{articleId} order by ARTICLEID desc
